alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 07 at 2:22PM AKST until December 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibilities. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibilities of one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will continue through early Friday. Winds turn northwest and increase this afternoon causing low visibility. Strong northwest winds this afternoon into early Friday could lead to elevated surf pushing ice onto the beach and tidal zone. People with valuables on beach should move them further inland. This could particularly impact Scammon Bay and south.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
